pullRequest.title: Add screenshot subdirectories
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR expands the ImageCapture util to allow a parameter to specify a subdirectory where, within a player's screenshots directory, the captured image will be stored, and extends the screenshot plugin to utilize this added functionality.
Closes #8711
Closes #8813
Closes #10204

commit.message:
util: Add subdirectory option to image captures

This commit adds an optional and nullable `subDir` string to the
`takeScreenshot()` function, allowing screenshots to be filed into a
subdirectory within the player's screenshots folder.

beforeCommit.message:
screenshot plugin: Capture screenshots to subdirectories

Closes #8711

Co-authored-by: Jordan Atwood <jordan.atwood423@gmail.com>

afterCommit.message:
screenshot plugin: Capture screenshots to subdirectories

Closes #8711

Co-authored-by: Jordan Atwood <jordan.atwood423@gmail.com>
